placeholders.initial: Click the button to get an inspiring quote

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Limitations live only in our minds.
quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

quotes.text: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Believe in yourself and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.text: A man is but the product of his thoughts. What he thinks, he becomes.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The road to success is always under construction.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.text: Don't let the past steal your present.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.text: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: It's never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Everyone has inside them a piece of good news. The good news is you don't know how great you can be!
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: To win without risk is to triumph without glory.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.text: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: Do today what others won't, so tomorrow you can do what others can't.
quotes.author: Jared Leto

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain
